actions.name: CreateParallelData
actions.description: Grants permission to create a Parallel Data

actions.name: DeleteParallelData
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a Parallel Data

actions.name: DeleteTerminology
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a terminology

actions.name: DescribeTextTranslationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with an asynchronous batch translation job

actions.name: GetParallelData
actions.description: Grants permission to get a Parallel Data

actions.name: GetTerminology
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a terminology

actions.name: ImportTerminology
actions.description: Grants permission to create or update a terminology, depending on whether or not one already exists for the given terminology name

actions.name: ListLanguages
actions.description: Grants permission to list supported languages

actions.name: ListParallelData
actions.description: Grants permission to list Parallel Data associated with your account

actions.name: ListTerminologies
actions.description: Grants permission to list terminologies associated with your account

actions.name: ListTextTranslationJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to list batch translation jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: StartTextTranslationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous batch translation job. Batch translation jobs can be used to translate large volumes of text across multiple documents at once

actions.name: StopTextTranslationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an asynchronous batch translation job that is in progress

actions.name: TranslateText
actions.description: Grants permission to translate text from a source language to a target language

actions.name: UpdateParallelData
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Parallel Data
